name: Google Ads
description: The Google Ads Connector allows you to access the Google Ads API. This lets you create, update, and delete ad campaigns and ads.

operations.name: customAudiencesMutate
operations.description: Customers Custom Audiences Mutate

params.name: search
params.description: Search for an attribute using the display name

params.name: customerId
params.description: The ID of the customer whose custom audiences are being modified. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: operations
params.description: The list of operations to perform on individual custom audiences.

params.name: validateOnly
params.description: If true, the request is validated but not executed. Only errors are returned, not results.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: getUserLists
operations.description: List down all User Lists

params.name: customerId
params.description: The ID of the customer being queried. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: userListName
params.description: Filter by UserList Name.

params.name: pageToken
params.description: Token of the page to retrieve. If not specified, the first page of results will be returned. Use the value obtained from next Page Token in the previous response in order to request the next page of results.

params.name: pageSize
params.description: Number of elements to retrieve in a single page. When too large a page is requested, the server may decide to further limit the number of returned resources.

params.name: validateOnly
params.description: If true, the request is validated but not executed.

params.name: returnTotalResultsCount
params.description: If true, the total number of results that match the query ignoring the LIMIT clause will be included in the response. Default is false.

params.name: summaryRowSetting
params.description: Determines whether a summary row will be returned. By default, summary row is not returned. If requested, the summary row will be sent in a response by itself after all other query results are returned.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: userDataMutate
operations.description: Customers Create/Remove User Data

params.name: customerId
params.description: Required. The ID of the customer for which to update the user data. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: userListId
params.description: Required. The list id of the user list to add or remove users from.

params.name: inputStructure
params.description: The type of input data structure.

params.name: operations
params.description: Import the user data and operations to be performed as a JSON object.

params.name: jsonArrayContent
params.description: User data to be uploaded.

params.name: operationType
params.description: The operation to be performed on the user list.

params.name: userIdentifierSource
params.description: The source of the user identifiers.

params.name: transactionAttributes
params.description: The transaction attributes for the user data to be uploaded.

params.name: userAttributes
params.description: The user attributes for the user data to be uploaded.

params.name: consent
params.description: The consent for the user data to be uploaded.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: campaignsMutate
operations.description: Customers Campaigns Mutate

params.name: search
params.description: Search for an attribute using the display name

params.name: customerId
params.description: The ID of the customer whose campaigns are being modified. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: operations
params.description: The list of operations to perform on individual campaigns.

params.name: partialFailure
params.description: If true, successful operations will be carried out and invalid operations will return errors. If false, all operations will be carried out in one transaction if and only if they are all valid. Default is false.

params.name: validateOnly
params.description: If true, the request is validated but not executed. Only errors are returned, not results.

params.name: responseContentType
params.description: The response content type setting. Determines whether the mutable resource or just the resource name should be returned post mutation.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: createCustomerClient
operations.description: Customers Create Customer Client

params.name: search
params.description: Search for an attribute using the display name

params.name: customerId
params.description: The ID of the Manager under whom client customer is being created. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: customerClient
params.description: The new client customer to create. The resource name on this customer will be ignored.

params.name: accessRole
params.description: The proposed role of user on the created client customer. Accessible only to customers on the allow-list.

params.name: validateOnly
params.description: If true, the request is validated but not executed. Only errors are returned, not results.

params.name: emailAddress
params.description: Email address of the user who should be invited on the created client customer. Accessible only to customers on the allow-list.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the Google Ads connection.

params.name: clientId
params.description: Client ID of the registered application.

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: Client secret of the registered application.

params.name: refreshToken
params.description: The refresh token that can be used to obtain a new access token.

params.name: base
params.description: The service root URL.

params.name: apiVersion
params.description: API Version used to connect with the mail server

params.name: developerToken
params.description: The developer token for the Google Ads connection.

params.name: loginCustomerId
params.description: The ID of the Manager Account. Required when using a manager account to access an customer account. E.g., 1234567890

params.name: tokenEndpoint
params.description: An HTTP endpoint that can be uses to obtain an access token.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Config operation

operations.name: adGroupAdsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes ads. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: adGroupsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes ad groups. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: adsMutate
operations.description: Updates ads. Operation statuses are returned. Updating ads is not supported for TextAd, ExpandedDynamicSearchAd, GmailAd and ImageAd.

operations.name: campaignBudgets
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaign budgets. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: campaignsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaigns. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: createCustomerClient
operations.description: Creates a new client under manager. The new client customer is returned.

operations.name: search
operations.description: Returns all rows that match the search query.

operations.name: customersMutate
operations.description: Updates a customer. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: audiencesMutate
operations.description: Creates audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: customAudiencesMutate
operations.description: Creates or updates custom audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: campaignCriteriaMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes criteria. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: userListsMutate
operations.description: Creates or updates user lists. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: userDataMutate
operations.description: Add or remove users to an user list.

operations.name: getCustomers
operations.description: Returns all customers.

operations.name: getCampaigns
operations.description: Returns all campaigns.

operations.name: getUserLists
operations.description: Returns all user lists.
